mapper.select:
select ,
from p_order a left join sgdxx b on a.SGDID = b.id where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
select ,
from p_order a left join sgdxx b on a.SGDID = b.id where 1=1
AND ( a.ORDER_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') OR a.REMARK LIKE concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') OR a.ORDER_NUMBER LIKE concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') OR a.ORDER_DETAIL LIKE concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') OR a.LX_NUMBER LIKE concat('%',#{searchKey},'%') )
limit #{limit1}, #{limit2}
